name: Last Breath (0ur0boss)
description:
Welcome to last breath,

You wake up, with a foggy mind. You are facing a castle, but you can't seem to get inside. Venture into the depths of the cliff and clear your mind by finding your Memories fragment. 

In this first level made during the game jam "EMMI Jam", learn to master the wind, conquer your castle, and win back your crown! The theme of the Jam was Memories and the constraint was "The game must start and end as different genres".
